name: Space Intruder
overview:
Space Intruder was produced by Shoei in 1980.

Move your tank back and forth along the bottom of the screen and shoot endless waves of aliens marching towards earth. Shoot the flying saucer for extra points.

It is a clone/ripoff (not a bootleg) of Taito's Space Invaders (primarily Space Invaders II), although there is some subtle differences in the gameplay.
